string.text: Find a Stone Blood artifact
Sidorovich asked me to get a Stone Blood artifact, part of an order he received from the scientists. He promised a good reward.
I got an order from the scientists for the Stone Blood artifact. I seem to remember they have heaps of those lying around, but if they need it, they need it. You up for it?
Bring the Stone Blood to Sidorovich
Artifact found. Now I can see the trader for my reward.
Find a Meat Chunk artifact
Another request from Sidorovich: get the Meat Chunk artifact. He's offered more money than usual for this hunt, so I should look for it.
The scientists have sent another order, this time for a Meat Chunk. Don't pass this up — I'll pay you more than what it's usually worth!
Bring the Meat Chunk to Sidorovich
The reward should be bigger this time than the last. I hope it'll be worth it.
Find a Wrenched artifact
Another scientist artifact order from Sidorovich. I need to get him a Wrenched — for that, he'll share a generous part of his wealth.
So, the eggheads have ordered another artifact. Get me a Wrenched and I'll get you a nice reward.
Bring the Wrenched to Sidorovich
The third in the line of artifact orders is done. Sidorovich should be generous now more than ever.
Get a pseudodog tail
Besides artifacts, scientists send Sidorovich orders for mutant body parts. For now, the trader has asked me to bring a pseudodog tail.
The scientists are doing research on the nature of mutants. I got an order for a pseudodog tail. Will you take it?
Bring the pseudodog tail to Sidorovich
I have the pseudodog tail. Time to return to the trader for the reward.
Get three tushkan heads
Another order's come in for mutant body parts. I need to get the heads of three tushkans.
Here's the next mutant order: three tushkan heads. Good pay in it for you.
Bring the tushkan heads to Sidorovich
I found all three tushkan heads. Time to return to the trader and get my reward.
Get a bloodsucker jaw
Sidorovich has ordered a bloodsucker jaw. He promised a good reward, so it'll be worth a shot.
Yet another urgent order from the scientists. Bring me a bloodsucker jaw and I'll pay you generously.
Bring the bloodsucker jaw to Sidorovich
I've completed the trader's request. Time to hand him this filth and get my well-earned reward.
Kill the stalker novice
Sidorovich has asked me to deal with a certain stalker novice who's been a thorn in his side. The trader guarantees anonymity when dealing with such contracts and promises a good reward.
I need a stalker who's been in a pain in my ass urgently taken care of. We won't go over the details; just know that the price for these things is worth it and your identity stays safe.
Tell Sidorovich that the stalker is dead
Sidorovich's pain-in-the-ass stalker won't be a pain for anyone anymore. Time to retrieve my reward.
Kill the "sales representative"
Sidorovich is crossed again, this time by a certain "sales representative". I need to deal with him.
Another sprat is trying to get a piece of my business dealings — he's calling himself a "sales representative". Remove him and you'll get a well-earned reward.
Tell Sidorovich that the bandit is dead
The stalker who put a price on Sidorovich's head turned out to be a bandit. I can now retrieve my reward.
Kill the small-time stalker trader
Someone is constantly putting spokes in the wheels of Sidorovich's peaceful business. I need to deal with another such stalker.
Your next task is to remove another small-time trader who's already done a lot of harm to me. Will you do it?
Tell Sidorovich that the stalker is dead
Another one of Sidorovich's hits is done. Time to grab my reward.
